nameLower: new employee onboarding process - technical team
name: New Employee Onboarding Process - Technical Team
content:
Technical Team Onboarding Guide

Week 1 Checklist:

  1. System Access

    • Development environment setup

    • GitHub access and SSH keys

    • Internal tools configuration

  2. Documentation Review

    • Architecture overview

    • Coding standards

    • Security protocols

Required Training:

  • Security best practices (mandatory)

  • Code review process

  • Deployment procedures

Resources:

  • Internal wiki: wiki.synergyos.local

  • Training videos: learning.synergyos.com
